SELECT d.department as department, COUNT(e.edepartment) as count FROM department AS d LEFT JOIN employee_info AS e ON d.department = e.edepartment AND (e.estatus = '재직' OR e.estatus = '휴직') GROUP BY d.department;
mapper.update: UPDATE department SET department = #{department} where id = #{id};
update employee_info set edepartment = #{department} where edepartment = (SELECT department from department WHERE id = #{id});
